old:
装備はできるだけ軽くしておけよ
足の差はでかいぞ
column2:
Try to keep your equipment as light as possible.
The difference in mobility is significant.
speaker: Lightly-Equipped Soldier

old:
大型魔物に登るときは、奴らの動きを
よく観察しろよ
column2: When climbing on large monsters, observe their movements well.
speaker: Lightly-Equipped Soldier
